About Me

Hello viewers, I am Shaan Alam. I am a self taught Web Developer, Designer & Programmer. I have been learning Web Development for quite few years. I have the required skills to make interactive, professional websites. Though I am currently in the process of learning Web Development, I have deep knowledge in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Sass, Bootstrap, & JavaScript libraries like React and many more. JavaScript Color Pallette

It's a simple random color pallette made in HTML, CSS, & JS. This application's main purpose was to solve my very own problem to get colors for my Front End Projects. It has features to generate, copy, and save your colors in localStorage. The application is not responsive on mobile devices, but I will try to make it work on mobile devices too very soon!
